title: Crime Alert 10.13.20
itunes:title: Crime Alert 10.13.20
description:
Dad refuses to allow police to break windows in his car after locking his daughter inside. Elderly man pulls a gun in Walmart, saying he's with Homeland Security.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
